QuestData.Title: Estate Jewelry: A Braggart's Brooch
QuestData.Description: Amateur merchants worry about losing face from bad products. Masters worry about losing face from bad customers.$b$bNaltethis Springblade has grown too bold for his station, and as such has lost much standing in the eyes of the city's elite.$b$bI sold this man a brooch, a clasp he wears on his cape. I am careful to only sell to those above my station.$b$bMy pieces never tarnish, but my name and reputation are much more fragile. Relieve him of my property before he lowers me further.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Retrieve Lespin's Brooch from Naltethis Springblade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Lespin's Brooch from Naltethis Springblade.
QuestData.CompletionText: That oaf will undo years of hard work. It is so much easier to fall than it is to climb...
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, see! I told you it would not tarnish. Now there's nothing linking me to that fool...$b$bWhat's that? A plot to weaken his position? Regardless, the damage has been done. Better safe than sorry.
